message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a discounted price! I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is a steal considering its usual market value. I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm not sure if I'm comfortable with the price, considering the risk of it being low quality. I'd like to pass on this one.

I'm not interested in the upgrade package. I'm happy with the product as it is, and I don't want to spend any more money on it.
